extendedInfo.description: "DroiDP" is a pipe flow calculator for water. The user inputs pipe inside diameter, pipe length (default 100 feet), pipe roughness (default steel pipe roughness) and water flow rate. The program computes pipe velocity and head loss using the Fanning friction factor method.Legal:This software is provided "as is".  In no event shall the author, T.B. Bechtel, be held liable for any consequential, special, incidental or indirect damages of any kind arising out of the delivery, performance or use of this software.
